attributes.action: EU Referendum Conclusion Of 23rd June 2016 Must Stand For Great Britain To Leave
attributes.additional_details:
With a majority of nearly 52% (nearly 1.3 million voters more), and a turnout larger than expected and certainly much higher than any General Election, the results must stand and be adhered to. 

A turnout of 72% is huge If a second referendum is allowed, what happens if the Remain camp do not gain what they want? 

It is ridiculous, it would turn in to a circus. 

The majority won. Do not allow that to be overturned. 

It would be political suicide for any party to allow a 2nd referendum.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned request that the EU Referendum conclusion of 23rd June '16 must stand as a LEAVE result. 

We request that no further referendum be allowed. 

Mr Cameron stated this Referendum would be a one off,  not to be repeated...
